title: How do I restore pixel 4 (apps, settings, past comm) from the g-drive backup if I forgot my pattern?
content:
Hi everyone. I managed to lock my phone by forgetting my unlock pattern on Pixel 4. I restored the device to factory settings and find last backup on my Google drive that I want to use to restore my phone. I had the same option during installation but it prompted me to enter pattern that I forgot at the first place. 

Is there any way to get my old apps and all the communication back?
 Thanks for your help
